channel.title: Heroes Remix Contest - Voltt & Andrew Adams
channel.description:
What's up guys, me and Andrew Adams are holding a remix contest for our newest song, "Heroes." The song has spread throughout the community quickly and many have asked to remix. So, we've decided to hold a remix contest!
The project link: https://app.auxy.co/projects/x1MgQw2dOT_04Q2-4j9NoQ==. The track is up on soundcloud [here](https://soundcloud.com/volttmusic/andrew-adams-voltt-heroes).
All entries are due by **February 4.**
Good luck and I hope you guys have fun doing this!
![heroes|666x500](upload://sRaFCa2FlutBRCRKKvJLk1Cp8tn.jpg)

item.source: Heroes Remix Contest - Voltt & Andrew Adams

item.title: Heroes Remix Contest - Voltt & Andrew Adams
item.dc:creator: Mr_Mooo
item.description:
I really would join but

  1. I opened the project and my iPhone crashed…
  2. I tried it on my iPad but I didn’t have any ideas. Maybe it’s a good idea for a remix contest if you don’t do the entire song but instead just a small project with a few scenes but all the instruments. That way people don’t feel like they can’t improve it, which is what I felt. I’m sure you and Andrew Adams did a lot of editing because there was nothing I could do, no order or change I could make that would sound better than the actual song, or at least good.

Sorry. I really would’ve liked to enter but I just couldn’t make a remix. Maybe if I have another try another time, not for the contest but just for a fun remix?

Read full topic
